description.zh_tw: 可立即攻擊(不受召喚疲勞限制)
description.en_us: Can attack immediately (ignores summoning sickness)

description.zh_tw: 每回合結束損失一點生命值
description.en_us: Lose 1 health at the end of each turn

description.zh_tw: 直接消滅攻擊力低於特定值的單位
description.en_us: Destroy units with attack value lower than a specific threshold

description.zh_tw: 抵擋一次攻擊的所有傷害
description.en_us: Block all damage from the first attack

description.zh_tw: 可激活特殊技能，但之後會進入疲勞狀態1回合
description.en_us: Can activate special abilities, but becomes exhausted for 1 turn afterward

description.zh_tw: 回合結束時恢復1點生命
description.en_us: Heals 1 health at the end of your turn

description.zh_tw: 若滿血狀態可攻擊兩次
description.en_us: Can attack twice if at full health

description.zh_tw: 無法被敵人優先指定為攻擊目標
description.en_us: Cannot be prioritized as an attack target

description.zh_tw: 攻擊後使目標移動力-1
description.en_us: Reduces target's movement by 1 after attacking

description.zh_tw: 可承受一次致命傷害而存活
description.en_us: Can survive one lethal damage

description.zh_tw: 受到攻擊後立即反擊
description.en_us: Counterattacks immediately when attacked

description.zh_tw: 死亡時對周圍所有單位造成1點傷害
description.en_us: Deals 1 damage to all adjacent units when destroyed

description.zh_tw: 死亡時觸發特殊效果
description.en_us: Triggers a special effect when destroyed

description.zh_tw: 進場時觸發特殊效果
description.en_us: Triggers a special effect when played

description.zh_tw: 可同時擁有多個食物效果
description.en_us: Can have multiple food effects simultaneously

description.zh_tw: 擅長攻擊性戰術，主要關鍵字為嗆辣和爆炒
description.en_us: Specializes in aggressive tactics, primary keywords are Spicy Burn and Overheat

description.zh_tw: 擅長防禦策略，主要關鍵字為糖霜和糖爆
description.en_us: Specializes in defensive strategies, primary keywords are Frosted and Sugar Crash

description.zh_tw: 擅長持續性效果，主要關鍵字為滋補和清淡
description.en_us: Specializes in sustain effects, primary keywords are Nourishing and Bland

description.zh_tw: 擅長快速出擊，主要關鍵字為現炸和油膩
description.en_us: Specializes in quick attacks, primary keywords are Fresh-Fried and Greasy

description.zh_tw: 可用於任何陣營的通用卡牌
description.en_us: Generic cards that can be used with any faction

description.zh_tw: 可派上戰場的單位，擁有攻擊力和生命值
description.en_us: Units that can be deployed on the battlefield with attack and health values

description.zh_tw: 產生即時效果的卡牌
description.en_us: Cards that produce immediate effects

description.zh_tw: 影響整個戰場的持續性效果
description.en_us: Continuous effects that affect the entire battlefield

description.zh_tw: 代表玩家主堡的防禦建築
description.en_us: Defensive structures representing player's main castle

detail.zh_tw: 嗆辣：攻擊時對目標造成1點額外傷害
detail.en_us: Spicy Burn: Deals 1 extra damage when attacking

flavor_text.zh_tw: 他的劍帶著火辣辣的味道，讓敵人感到刺痛！
flavor_text.en_us: His sword carries a spicy taste that stings his enemies!

flavor_text.zh_tw: 甜美的外表下隱藏著強大的力量！
flavor_text.en_us: Great power hides beneath the sweet appearance!

flavor_text.zh_tw: 蔬菜的力量賦予他強大的生命力！
flavor_text.en_us: The power of vegetables gives him great vitality!
